name: Nightgarm
description: The Nightgarm is a large, chaotic evil monstrosity, often found in dark and sinister environments. It has notable physical strength and sharp claws, along with an ominous presence.
memorable: Its ability to summon wolves and communicate telepathically adds strategic depth to its combat tactics.
goals: To dominate its environment and subdue or consume prey.
relations: May create falsehearts that it communicates with telepathically.
strengths: Possesses strong physical power and resilience with high Hit Points.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and silvered weaponry.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee attacks, including a bite and claw, with a unique swallowing ability to incapacitate enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Telepathic Bond allows it to communicate across dimensions with its falseheart.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 15, indicating solid awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Skilled in Stealth and Perception, making it effective for ambushing.
additional_information: Can summon wolves to assist in battle.
Swallowing ability blinds and restrains targets.
Resistant to lightning and thunder damage.
test_queries: monstrosity with deadly bite and claws
dark creature that thrives in shadows
powerful monster with low silver defense
